casebody.data:
BURRIS
v.
THOMAS. No. 16P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Jennifer M. Chandler, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Burris, Maurice Antonio. *174Kathryn E. Hathcock, Assistant Attorney General, for Thomas, Kelly J. Commissioner.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of January 2016 by Petitioner for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
